source.365fdd99:
import rx
from rx import of,operators as op
source.e5a652af:
rx.range(5,10).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result = {0}".format(x)),
    on_error = lambda e : print("error = {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda :print("completed")
)
source.66b960fb:
rx.range(5,10).pipe(
    op.map(lambda x : x*x)
).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result = {0}".format(x)),
    on_error = lambda e : print("error = {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda :print("completed")
)
source.0f8016fd:
rx.range(100).pipe(
    op.map(lambda x : x*x),
    op.take_while(lambda val: val < 200) 
).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result = {0}".format(x)),
    on_error = lambda e : print("error = {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda :print("completed")
)
source.1baafc56:
rx.repeat_value(7,3).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result = {0}".format(x)),
    on_error = lambda e : print("error = {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda :print("completed")
)
source.e158c2da:
rx.repeat_value("hello",5).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result = {0}".format(x)),
    on_error = lambda e : print("error = {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda :print("completed")
)
